mapper.insert: insert into orders(OrderID, OrderDateTime, TotalAmount, del) values (0, now(), #{totalPrice}, 0)
insert into orderdetail(DetailID, OrderID, ProductID, Quantity) values (0, #{orderId}, #{productId}, #{quantity})
insert into toppingdetail(ToppingDetailID, OrderDetailID, ToppingID, ToppingQuantity) values (0, #{orderDetailId}, #{toppingId}, #{toppingQuantity})
mapper.select: SELECT o.OrderID, o.OrderDateTime, o.TotalAmount, d.DetailID, d.ProductID, d.Quantity, t.ToppingQuantity, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t.ToppingDetailID) AS ToppingDetailID, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t.ToppingID) AS ToppingID, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT p.ProductName) AS ProductName, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT top.ToppingName) AS ToppingName FROM orders o LEFT OUTER JOIN orderdetail d ON o.OrderID = d.OrderID LEFT OUTER JOIN toppingdetail t ON d.DetailID = t.OrderDetailID LEFT OUTER JOIN Product p ON d.ProductID = p.ProductID LEFT OUTER JOIN Topping top ON t.ToppingID = top.ToppingID WHERE o.OrderID = #{orderId} GROUP BY o.OrderID, o.OrderDateTime, o.TotalAmount, d.DetailID, d.ProductID, d.Quantity, t.ToppingQuantity ORDER BY o.OrderID DESC;
select od.DetailID, od.OrderID, od.ProductID, od.Quantity, p.ProductName from orderdetail od LEFT OUTER JOIN product p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID where OrderID = #{orderId};

select td.ToppingDetailID, td.OrderDetailID, td.ToppingID, td.ToppingQuantity, t.toppingName from toppingdetail td LEFT OUTER JOIN Topping t ON td.ToppingID = t.ToppingID where OrderDetailID = #{orderDetailId};
